title: Empowering the Leaders of Tomorrow
description: BYEO’s youth empowerment programs aim to create a safe and structured environment for young people to develop their potential. Programs focus on:
bullets: Promoting the love of education among youth.
Discovering and nurturing talents in the community.
Running anti-drug and alcohol campaigns to keep youth off the streets.

title: Safeguarding the Rights of Every Child
description: BYEO is committed to promoting the protection, development, and welfare of children. Programs focus on:
bullets: Strengthening community structures for child care and protection.

title: Breaking the Cycle of Violence
description: BYEO’s GBV prevention programs aim to raise awareness and provide support mechanisms for survivors. Key initiatives include:
bullets: Educating communities about the link between GBV and protection.
Organizing awareness campaigns and community discussions.
Providing psychosocial support, medical referrals, and legal aid for survivors.
